attributes.action: Allow Employment Tribunals to be heard by a Jury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Employment Tribunals are heavily biased towards the employer, with just 1 Judge (whos is often part time!) and 2 lay members.
A Trial by Jury as in criminal cases, would ensure that there is a greater chance of transparency and fairness in the process Vs the current situation, where bias is towards the employer.
